programme.title: Snowchef Canada
programme.desc: Canada's fabled Powder Highway, in British Columbia's Kootenay Rockies, offers stashes of powder snow and authentic ski towns jam-packed with cafes, restaurants, bars, distilleries, breweries, and more.
